tooltip.moreboots.socks_boots: §7§oKeeps you warm in cold biomes. Gets wet and heavy in water. Burns in fire
advancements.moreboots.root.title: More Boots
advancements.moreboots.root.description: Get those shoes (like how everyone waste their money on shoes in real life)!
advancements.moreboots.miner_boots.title: Official Miner
advancements.moreboots.miner_boots.descr: Get a permanent Haste effect with Miner Boots!
advancements.moreboots.water_boots.title: The Floor is NOT Lava
advancements.moreboots.water_boots.descr: Water Boots helps you to freeze lava!
advancements.moreboots.lava_boots.title: Melted
advancements.moreboots.lava_boots.descri: The real cobblestone generator with Lava Boots!
advancements.moreboots.socks_boots.title: Stay Warm
advancements.moreboots.socks_boots.descr: If you get cold, these socks keep you warm!
advancements.moreboots.rainbow_socks_boo: The Legendary Rainbow Socks we talk about!
advancements.moreboots.twelve_hours.desc: Build up speed for 12 hours with the Rainbow Socks. You will fall for hours!
advancements.moreboots.lapis_boots.title: Double XP
advancements.moreboots.lapis_boots.descr: No more XP farm needed (not actually) with Lapis Boots!
advancements.moreboots.obsidian_boots.de: Obsidian Boots prevent your items from breaking!
advancements.moreboots.milk_boots.title: He Need Some Milk
advancements.moreboots.plumber_boots.des: Craft the Plumber Boots to craft even more boots!
advancements.moreboots.vanishing_boots.d: Go through several blocks with Vanishing Boots!
advancements.moreboots.metal_boots.title: Behind the Wall
advancements.moreboots.metal_boots.descr: Omits any damage with Metal Boots!
